translate: Hearty congratulations, you’ve finished the game!

original: You’ve liberated the beleaguered town of Horryn
translate: You’ve liberated the beleaguered port town of Horryn

original: You’ve slain the foul leader of the Reavers on Idra
translate: You’ve dealt with the noisome leader of the Reavers on Idra

original: You managed to defeat the Reaver chieftains using wits rather than brawn
translate: You, Resourceful Odysseus, managed to overcome the Reaver Chieftains with wit and cunning; without the clashing of blades

original: You managed to help the wretched refugees of Horryn
translate: You provided aid to the unfortunate refugees of Horryn

original: You’ve sailed north to Gradla to uncover the secrets that may be found on the island's plateau
translate: You’ve sailed north, to Gradla, uncovering the secrets found upon the island's plateau

original: You've made it to the bleak shores of the Isle of Idra
translate: You've made it to the bleak shores of the Isle of Idra

original: The Black Priory reveals its secrets to you
translate: The Black Priory reveals its secrets to you

original: You stand at the threshold of the Black Priory
translate: You stand at the threshold of the Black Priory
